sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ templateUrl: './miscdemo.component.html' }) export class MiscDemoComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { value = 0; interval: any; ngOnInit() { this.interval = setInterval(() => { this.value = this.value + Math.floor(Math.random() * 10) + 1; if (this.value >= 100) { this.value = 100; clearInterval(this.interval); } }, 2000); } ngOnDestroy() { clearInterval(this.interval); } }
